mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project.delivery(employee_no, delivery_date, progress_status) VALUES (#{employeeNo}, #{dto.deliveryDate}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT delivery_no FROM project.delivery ORDER BY SUBSTRING(delivery_no, 2, 4) DESC, SUBSTRING(delivery_no, 7) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT D.delivery_no AS delivery_no, E.name AS employee_name, D.delivery_date AS delivery_date, D.progress_status AS delivery_status FROM project.delivery D LEFT JOIN project.employee E ON D.employee_no = E.employee_no WHERE D.delivery_no = #{delivery_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project.delivery WHERE YEAR(delivery_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) AND MONTH(delivery_date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE);
SELECT * FROM project.delivery WHERE employee_no = #{employeeNo} ORDER BY SUBSTRING(delivery_no, 2, 4) DESC, SUBSTRING(delivery_no, 7) DESC LIMIT 6

choose.when: SELECT date, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_no IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as count FROM project.delivery RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL t.n - 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS date FROM ( SELECT 0 AS n UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4) t) t ON t.date = DATE_FORMAT(delivery_date, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.date;

SELECT date, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_no IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as count FROM project.delivery RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL t.n - 2 YEAR), '%Y') AS date FROM ( SELECT 0 AS n UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 ) t) t ON t.date = DATE_FORMAT(delivery_date, '%Y') GROUP BY t.date;
choose.otherwise: SELECT date, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_no IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as count FROM project.delivery RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL t.n - 2 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM ( SELECT 0 AS n UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4) t) t ON t.date = DATE_FORMAT(delivery_date, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY t.date;

choose.when: SELECT progress_status AS progress, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project.delivery WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH) GROUP BY progress_status

SELECT progress_status AS progress, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project.delivery WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) GROUP BY progress_status
choose.otherwise: SELECT progress_status AS progress, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project.delivery WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) GROUP BY progress_status

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM project.delivery WHERE delivery_no = #{deliveryNo} AND progress_status = 0
